page.title: 03Queen's Park Bowling Club
page.content: I am a member of Queen's Park Bowling and Tennis Club. It was founded in 1867 and has grown ever since. Now in 1985 it has approximately 200 members. There are 3 large bowling greens and 3 tennis courts. The clubhouse has lounges, bars, changing rooms etc and the rules must be obeyed at all times. The tennis teams are entered in some of the top tennis leagues in the West of Scotland. Coaching is available for everyone from age 9 upwards, on a Saturday morning. A junior tennis member pays Â£14 for the annual subscription. When I have finished playing tennis I go upstairs to the T.V lounge. I have been a member of the club for 3 years and I enjoy it immensely.
